gdverse 0.0.0.9900

  • Articles
    optimal parameters geographic detector(OPGD)

gdverse

The goal of gdverse is to support the geodetector model and its variants.

Installation

You can install the development version of gdverse from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("SpatLyu/gdverse",build_vignettes = T,dep = T)

or install gdverse from r-universe:

install.packages('gdverse', repos='https://spatlyu.r-universe.dev')

Example

OPGD model 

library(sf)
library(terra)
library(tidyverse)
library(gdverse)
fvcpath = "https://github.com/SpatLyu/rdevdata/raw/main/FVC.tif"
fvc = terra::rast(paste0("/vsicurl/",fvcpath))
fvc = as_tibble(terra::as.data.frame(fvc,na.rm = T))
head(fvc)

tictoc::tic()
g = gd_bestunidisc(fvc ~ .,data = select(fvc,-lulc),discnum = 2:15,cores = 6)
tictoc::toc()
## 14.33 sec elapsed
new.fvc = bind_cols(select(fvc,fvc,lulc),g$disv)
gd(fvc ~ .,data = new.fvc,type = 'factor')
